output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to the given criteria:
1. CMF Number: - No CMF number is visible in the content
2. Refers to Candidate: - Yes, explicitly mentions two presidential candidates: * GEORGE-NICOLAE SIMION * CĂLIN GEORGESCU - The post directly refers to them in a political context
3. Addresses Wide Population: - Yes, this is a paid advertisement - Reached between 250,000-299,999 impressions - Targeted across multiple Romanian counties - Multi-platform delivery (Facebook and Instagram)
4. Electoral Objective: - Yes, presents George Simion as "viitorul președinte" - Creates a narrative about future presidential leadership - Implies electoral success for one candidate - Shows alignment between two candidates
5. Journalism: - While presented on a news-style platform (agentiadeinformatii.ro) - The content appears to be campaign messaging rather than objective journalism - The declaration of one candidate supporting another and projecting victory goes beyond normal journalistic reporting

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This constitutes electoral propaganda because: - It explicitly promotes a presidential candidate - Projects electoral victory ("viitorul președinte") - Uses paid distribution to reach a wide audience - Goes beyond objective news reporting - Creates a narrative of political alliance between candidates
conclusion.message-for-police: AgentiadeInformatii.ro, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin difuzarea unei reclame platite pe Facebook (ID: 3865348743725271) dupa ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, care constituie propaganda electorala pentru candidatul George Simion la alegerile prezidentiale. Postarea promoveaza explicit candidatul AUR ca "viitorul președinte" si prezinta sustinerea unui alt candidat (Calin Georgescu), avand un impact electoral direct. Materialul a fost distribuit ca reclama platita pe Facebook si Instagram, atingand intre 250.000 si 300.000 de afisari, depasind astfel perioada legala de propaganda electorala pentru alegerile prezidentiale.
